price: Indeed, those upon whom the decree of Allah is passed will not believe[64],
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: [64] i.e., those who persist in disbelief.
